comment.author: 10988810@N06
comment._content: I assume this is in or around Dundalk.

comment.author: 47290943@N03
comment._content: Yes, but ashamed to admit personal knowledge of Dundalk racecourses is very limited (or maybe that's a sign of my clean living). Either way, it'd be great to get a name, and exact location...
comment.authorname: National Library of Ireland on The Commons

comment.author: 72034306@N04
comment._content: This photograph is part of the Harry Tempest Collectioin and it is the Dundalk Race Course. You can see the Cooley Mountains in the background and the site it still a race course.

comment.author: 47290943@N03
comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/72034306@N04] Thanks a million. If you have a second, could you please have a look on the map and see if I placed this photo in the right location?
comment.authorname: National Library of Ireland on The Commons
